thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Christopher Smith

author: Christopher Smith
title: Christopher Smith
text: usually dread going to car dealers but shannon was down to earth, a good sales person but a good guy also ..we went in there 'looking' and ended up buying a new triton. We originally were looking at second hand utes and a helpful guy from that department reffered us on to shannon . We borrowed that make overnight and that made our decision much easier.
